nodes.text: The Tyrelli Habitat was an arboretum tower located in the Axial Park district's Archival Square of Coronet City, the capital city of the planet Corellia. The building was thousands of meters high and home to thousands of civilians, and many of the floors featured displays of exotic plants. In 3640 BBY, during the Battle of Corellia between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, Sith and Imperial forces installed a weapon known as the Firestorm Turbolaser in the upper floors of the Habitat and other buildings as part of Operation Firestorm—a Sith plot designed by the fallen Jedi Master Tol Braga to inflict heavy casualties in Axial Park with the Turbolasers. However, the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython flew an assault shuttle to one of the Habitat's landing pads and infiltrated the building, eliminating the Sith and Imperials within and destroying the Turbolaser.
The Tyrelli Habitat first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011, as a class-restricted phase for the Jedi Knight class mission "Firestorm."
